text: The Official Story (), also known as The Official Version, is a 1985 Argentine war drama movie directed by Luis Puenzo. It stars Norma Aleandro, Héctor Alterio, Hugo Arana, Chunchuna Villafañe, Guillermo Battaglia, Chela Ruiz, Patricio Contreras and was nominated for 2 Oscars and won an Academy Awards in 1986. ==Other websites== * Category:1985 drama movies Category:1985 war movies Category:Argentine drama movies Category:Movies directed by Luis Puenzo
title: The Official Story
